name: Block World Adventure
shortDescription: A fun adventure game in a blocky world.
longDescription: Block World Adventure is an exciting game where players explore vast landscapes, build structures, and embark on epic quests. Developed using Unity, this game features procedurally generated worlds and a unique crafting system. Players can gather resources, fight monsters, and collaborate with friends in multiplayer mode.

name: Space Shooter Infinity
longDescription: Pilot your starfighter through an infinite asteroid field, battling waves of alien enemies. Collect power-ups, upgrade your ship, and compete for the highest score in this classic arcade-style shooter. Built with Godot Engine for fast-paced action and retro visuals.
